H0.text: Spreading plant and animal life over a wider area is how ocean currents, such as the Gulf Stream, affect world climate.

H1.text: Ensuring ocean density is not the same globally is how ocean currents, like the Gulf Stream, affect world climate.

H2.text: Carrying sediment from rivers and inland basins is how ocean currents, such as the Gulf Stream, affect world climate.

H3.text: Transferring heat to and from various regions is how ocean currents, such as the Gulf Stream, affect world climate.

A4.text: Ocean currents influence the temperature of the regions through which they travel.

A5.text: Warm currents traveling along more temperate coasts increase the temperature of the area by warming the sea breezes that blow over them.
